fields.description:
(This is not a problem with the Android emulator)

After opening an XMPP connection with the server, the iPhone client waits 10 seconds and then closes the connection.  It repeats this activity every 10 seconds thereafter.  The client is using the Sprophe XMPP library.

Wire trace at http://pastebin.com/xZFHFYuB  The packet sent at 07:00:31.425308 closes the connection, the server acks, and the next packet (at 07:00:31.428480) opens a new connection on a different TCP port.  

No callbacks are executed during this period (no breakpoints hit).  There is nothing written to the Titanium debug logs during this event.

The same exact code works normally in the Android emulator.
fields.summary: iPhone client closes TCP connection after 10 seconds

comments.body:
Thanks for raising this ticket.

In order for me to escalate it to the core team, all the fields must be complete. Please check it against the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist], and add any missing information.

Furthermore, a test case must run without modification, as per the [Creating a Test Case|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-CreatingaTestCase] section.

I will close this for now. Please reopen it once it is complete, and I will move it to the main project.

Cheers
